info.name: wave pixel distribution
info.description: A representation of pixel distribution across a wave of increasing frequency.  Mouse X to pan.

renderpass.code:
#define X sin(x*x - iTime)  // graph equation

void mainImage(out vec4 C, in vec2 U)
{
    float x, s = 10.; // scale
    
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,
         u = (U+U-R)/R.y*s*2.; // coords
    
    vec3 c = vec3(0, 1, 2)/20.; // background color
    
    u.x += iMouse.x/R.x*4e2; // shift x with mouse
    
    x = u.x/s; // scale
    x = X*s;   // pattern
    c.r += .5 * min(1., fwidth(x)/abs(u.y-x)) // red wave
         * step(abs(u.y), s); // trim top & bottom
    
    x = round(u.x)/s;               // round & scale
    x = X;                          // pattern
    u -= round( vec2(u.x, x*s) );   // shift coords
    u = max(vec2(0), 1.-abs(u)*2.); // form squares
    c += min(u.x, u.y);             // draw squares
    c.gb += x*.1+.1;                // gradient
    
    C = vec4(tanh(c + c*c), 1);
}
